name: Nikhil Kumar
position: Investment Banking Analyst at Arpwood Capital | IIT KGP | FRM Part 1
about: Nikhil Kumar is a finance professional with a background in investment banking and a keen interest in finance and politics. Graduating from IIT Kharagpur in 2022, Nikhil currently serves as an Investment Banking Analyst at Arpwood Capital, specializing in Mergers and Acquisitions (M&A). During his time at IIT Kharagpur, Nikhil actively engaged in various student societies and served as the General Secretary of Students' Welfare at the Technology Students' Gymkhana. He is passionate about analyzing market trends, understanding business strategies, and exploring the intersection of finance with broader global issues. Nikhil is eager to further expand his expertise and contribute to impactful financial initiatives.
